metadata.title: CVE-2023-6345 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in Skia in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.199 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a malicious file. (Chromium security severity:High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
